mainBoard.flavorText: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.
mainBoard.name: Goblin Cavaliers

foreignData.name: Zündelnder Goblin
foreignData.text: Du kannst den Zündelnden Goblin in Deinem Zug vor Deinem Angriff zerstören, damit er einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zufügt.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Firestarter
mainBoard.originalText: On your turn, before you attack, you may destroy Goblin Firestarter to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

mainBoard.text: Sacrifice this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

mainBoard.flavorText: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

foreignData.name: Goblin-General
foreignData.text: Wenn der Goblin-General angreift, erhalten alle Deine Goblins +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Goblin General
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin General attacks, all your Goblins get +1/+1 until the end of the turn.
mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."

foreignData.name: Goblinsegler
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Der Goblinsegler kann nicht blocken.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Glider

foreignData.name: Goblinmatrone
foreignData.text: Wenn die Goblinmatrone aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einer Goblinkarte und nimm die Karte auf Deine Hand. Mische Deine Bibliothek danach neu.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Matron
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Matron comes into play from your hand, search your library for a Goblin card and put that card into your hand. Shuffle your library afterwards.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, Goblin War Party is a card that references and creates Goblins, but it isn't a Goblin card.

mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

mainBoard.flavorText: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.
mainBoard.name: Goblin Piker

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I seen lots o' fights. To win ya gotta bash hard and not get bashed back."
—Goblin grunt
mainBoard.name: Goblin Raider

mainBoard.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

foreignData.name: Wütender Goblin
foreignData.text: Für den Wütende Goblin gilt die Einsatzverzögerung nicht

mainBoard.name: Raging Goblin
mainBoard.originalText: Raging Goblin is unaffected by summoning sickness.
mainBoard.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

mainBoard.flavorText:
"This isn't what I meant by 'facing the heat of battle!'"
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

foreignData.name: Heiße Glut
foreignData.text: Die Heiße Glut fügt einem Spieler oder einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Blaze
mainBoard.originalText: Blaze deals X damage to any one creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Anschlag der Goblins
foreignData.text: Der Anschlag der Goblins fügt Deinem Gegner Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Anzahl der Goblinkarten, die Du im Spiel hast, zu (das gilt für getappte und ungetappte Goblins).

mainBoard.name: Goblin War Strike
mainBoard.originalText: Goblin War Strike deals to your opponent damage equal to the number of Goblin cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped Goblin cards.)
mainBoard.text: Goblin War Strike deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of Goblins you control.

foreignData.name: Unnachgiebiger Ansturm
foreignData.text: Entappe alle Kreaturen, die in diesem Zug angegriffen haben. Du kannst in diesem Zug einen zusätzlichen Angriff deklarieren.

mainBoard.name: Relentless Assault
mainBoard.originalText: Untap all your creatures that attacked this turn. You may declare an additional attack this turn.

rulings.text: A creature that attacks each turn if able must attack only once that turn. It is not forced into each attack that turn. However, a creature that attacks each combat if able must attack again if it can.
Abilities that trigger when a creature attacks, blocks, or is blocked will trigger during each combat that turn.

If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent's turn, that opponent's creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.
Relentless Assault creates an additional combat and main phase only if it resolves during a main phase.

mainBoard.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

mainBoard.flavorText: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

foreignData.name: Vulkanhammer
foreignData.text: Der Vulkanhammer fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Volcanic Hammer
mainBoard.originalText: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any one creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Verbrannte Steppe
foreignData.text: Du zerstörst 4 Deiner Länder und Dein Gegner zerstört vier seiner Länder. Die Verbrannte Steppe fügt jeder Kreatur 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Wildfire
mainBoard.originalText: You destroy four of your lands and your opponent destroys four of his or her lands. Then Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature. (This includes your creatures.)
mainBoard.text: Each player sacrifices four lands of their choice. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
